parameters.name: Append
parameters.description: True appends this selection to the selection list, false replaces the selection list with this selection

title: ISilhouetteEdge.Select2
description: Selects the silhouette edge in the active drawing view.
signature:
System.Boolean Select2( 
   System.Boolean
Append
,
   SelectData
Data
)

parameters.name: Append
parameters.description: True appends this selection to the selection list, false replaces the selection list with this selection

returns: True if the selection is successful, false if not
